no that wont help, the problem is on the mount level, not on the node level
the nodes are created dynamically everytime you plug in the ubs device
okay.  well.  umount the device
sudo mount -t ext3 /dev/<device>
then you should be able to reach everything as root
sudo mount -t ext3 /dev/<device> /media/<empty folder>
